hanzi-su-wiki:
産

Значения

Рожать, порождать; первый, младенческий; производство; имущество

Мнемоника

  • Рожать 生 в муках. Овал 厂 лица от боли покрыт узорами 文 морщин.

  • "Я произвожу овощи на своём поле."

Варианты

產, 产
purpleculture_pinyin:
chǎn
Japanese variant of 产
Японский вариант производства
rtega_mnemonic:
産産RS
X		childbirth, product, property, give birth to, be born, birth
  • baby = young life 生 with the wrinkled face of an old man 产
𠫓 誕

產產RS
産産		产give birth, product, property
  • standing woman 立 giving birth to a new life 生 from her womb 厂
𠫓 誕
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 产 indicates the sound; 生 (birth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 产 [ chǎn ] to give birth, to bring forth, to produce
    • 生 [ shēng ] life, lifetime; birth; growth
heisig_constituent: products, vase, stand up, cliff, life, This is Your Life, cell, drop, grow up
Keyword_KANJIDIC: products, bear, give birth, yield, childbirth, native, property
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: продукты, медведь, рожает, урожайность, роды, родная, недвижимость
koohiiStory1: If you were to stand up all the products you have accumulated over the course of your entire life on top of one another, the result would probably be as tall as a cliff.
koohiiStory2: The salesman is standing on the cliff´s edge. "Buy my products!! Buy my products! Or else I´ll take my own life"! Man, that´s selling on pressure.
kunYomi: う.む、う.まれる、うぶ-、む.す
jp_example_words:
産む(うむ): to give birth, to deliver, to produce
お産(おさん): (giving) birth
国産(こくさん): domestic products
産休(さんきゅう): maternity leave
産後(さんご): postpartum, after childbirth
産出(さんしゅつ): yield, produce
産婦人科(さんふじんか): maternity and gynecology department
産物(さんぶつ): product, result, fruit
資産(しさん): property, fortune, means, assets
出産(しゅっさん): (child)birth, delivery, production (of goods)
畜産(ちくさん): animal husbandry
倒産(とうさん): (corporate) bankruptcy, insolvency
特産(とくさん): specialty, special product
土産(どさん): product of the land
不動産(ふどうさん): real estate
名産(めいさん): noted product
共産(きょうさん): communism
原産(げんさん): place of origin, habitat
財産(ざいさん): property, fortune, assets
産業(さんぎょう): industry
産地(さんち): producing area
水産(すいさん): marine products, fisheries
生産(せいさん): production, manufacture
農産物(のうさんぶつ): agricultural produce
破産(はさん): (personal) bankruptcy
土産(みやげ): product of the land
お土産(おみやげ): souvenir
jp_readingExamples: 産まれる (う.まれる), 産む (う.む), 産 (うぶ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You stand on the Cliff of Life and give birth to a child. Oh no! You’re standing too close to the edge of the Cliff of Life! The baby falls off the cliff right after you give birth to it!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The baby is falling off the cliff! Imagine the sheer terror you feel as the baby plummets to the ground below.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You give birth, and now this happens. Such bad luck. But wait! What's that sound? Sleigh bells? Could it be?! It's Santa-san (さん)! He caught your baby!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Oh Santa-san. You're always here for me when I need you most. Even when I'm giving birth to your child.
Ru_Meaning: products, bear, give birth, yield, childbirth, native, property
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 亠 (крышка), 并, 厂 (скала), 生 (жизнь), 立 (стоять)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: standing on the cliff (产) over life (生) = giving birth
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
産
Pinyin: chǎn
English Definition: Japanese variant of 产
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 生
Pictophonetic: 产 indicates the sound; 生 (birth) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 产 [ chǎn ] to give birth, to bring forth, to produce
    • 生 [ shēng ] life, lifetime; birth; growth

Main pronunciation 主要发音: chǎn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) to give birth.

English senses 英语理解: give birth, bring forth, produce

Usage example 用法举例: 產生 chǎn shēng (produce)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 196

Shuowen 说文解字: 生也從生彥省聲

(- something to come out) (- 文 indicates a person)

産字的基本解释

産
chǎn
见“产”。

産字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《廣韻》所簡切，上産，生。］
“產1”的新字形。“产1”的繁体字。
(1)养育；生。
(2)指生养的子女。
(3)出生；生长。
(4)出产。
(5)出产之物；物产。
(6)产业。
(7)生活；生业。
(8)产生；发生。
(9)指发生变乱。
(10)泛指事物。
(11)牲畜。
(12)古管乐器名。籥之一种。
(13)用同“滻”。水名。
(14)姓。见《万姓统谱·潸韵》。

産字的康熙字典解释
産字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
産字的起名意思

暂无。

Produce
Basic explanation of words
Produce
chǎn
See "Production".
Produce
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎn］
["Guangyun" is simple and cut, high-yield, and born. ]
The new glyph of "Production 1". "Production 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Nurturing; Health.
(2) Refers to children born and raised.
(3) Birth; growth.
(4) Production.
(5) Produced goods; property.
(6) Industry.
(7) Life; life industry.
(8) Produce; happen.
(9) Refers to a disorder.
(10) Refers to things in general.
(11) Livestock.
(12) The name of the ancient wind instrument. A kind of.
(13) Use the same as "浐". Water name.
(14) Last name. See "The Genealogy of Wan Xing·Lu Yun".

chǎn
кор., яп. вм. 产

産

Значения

Рожать, порождать; первый, младенческий; производство; имущество

Мнемоника

  • Рожать 生 в муках. Овал 厂 лица от боли покрыт узорами 文 морщин.

  • "Я произвожу овощи на своём поле."

Варианты

產, 产

Radicals: 立, 厂, 生  (stand, cliff, life)
Meaning Mnemonic
You stand on the Cliff of Life and give birth to a child. Oh no! You’re standing too close to the edge of the Cliff of Life! The baby falls off the cliff right after you give birth to it!
The baby is falling off the cliff! Imagine the sheer terror you feel as the baby plummets to the ground below.
Reading Mnemonic
You give birth, and now this happens. Such bad luck. But wait! What's that sound? Sleigh bells? Could it be?! It's Santa-san (さん)! He caught your baby!
Oh Santa-san. You're always here for me when I need you most. Even when I'm giving birth to your child.
